doc:
Marcus Chong https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcus_Chong 0 Marcus Chong (né Wyatt; July 8, 1967) is an American actor. His best-known roles are Huey P. Newton in Panther (1995), directed by Mario Van Peebles and Tank the Operator in The Matrix (1999). Marcus_Chong ( né_Wyatt ; July_8_,_1967 ) is an_American_actor . His_best-known_roles are Huey_P._Newton in Panther_(_1995_) , directed by Mario_Van_Peebles and Tank the_Operator in The_Matrix_(_1999_) .
